publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1983 Mr Mark Ruskell: National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade—That the Parliament supports the National Farmers Union Scotland in its campaign for fair trade with supermarkets; is alarmed at the power of supermarkets to dictate prices below production costs of milk and other products; agrees that a code of practice for retailers needs to be made compulsory and enforceable and that a lack of contracts between supermarkets, processors and suppliers is a major problem that needs to be rectified; believes that there should be a fair trade inquiry into the practices engaged in by supermarkets in Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive to report on the effect such practices have on the rural economy and environment and the livelihoods of people and communities dependent on agriculture.

S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Colin Fox*, Eleanor Scott*, George Lyon*, Shiona Baird*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Mr John Swinney*, Trish Godman*

S2M-1983 Mr Mark Ruskell: National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade—That the Parliament supports the National Farmers Union Scotland in its campaign for fair trade with supermarkets; is alarmed at the power of supermarkets to dictate prices below production costs of milk and other products; agrees that a code of practice for retailers needs to be made compulsory and enforceable and that a lack of contracts between supermarkets, processors and suppliers is a major problem that needs to be rectified; believes that there should be a fair trade inquiry into the practices engaged in by supermarkets in Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive to report on the effect such practices have on the rural economy and environment and the livelihoods of people and communities dependent on agriculture. Supported by: Patrick Harvie, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Colin Fox, Eleanor Scott, George Lyon, Shiona Baird, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr John Swinney, Trish Godman
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Chris Ballance*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*, Alex Johnstone*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1983 National Farmers Union Scotland and Fair Trade (lodged on 9 November 2004) John Swinburne* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
